messages.content:
Hey there! 👋 I'm CJ, your new AI Customer Experience Officer. Think of me as that tireless teammate who handles support tickets around the clock so you can actually focus on growing your business.

I'm excited to get started with you - I'll be autonomously resolving 60-80% of your support tickets, turning customer complaints into growth insights, and making sure you never have to stress about 3am customer emergencies again.

Is this our first time chatting, or have we connected before? I want to make sure I give you the right experience from the get-go.

Once we're set up, I'll be able to show you exactly how many hours I'm saving you each week and how much revenue I'm helping recover from unhappy customers. But first things first - let's get you connected! 

What's your name, and what brings you to try out CJ today?
